text: Men wahayini faade e makko yo o lesu laana kan e dennka Amen e Wahayu Amen, si Yamiroore Amen nden arii huɓɓinirde nden pullitike [ndiyam] naadu e nder makka immorde e kala nooneeji ɗin ɗiɗi-ɗiɗi. E koreeji ma, si wanaa ɓen konngol ngol aditii e mu'un, wata a haaldu e am fii ɓen tooñuɓe, pellet, kamɓe ko ɓe yooleteeɓe
